messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Atlanta GA
messages.msgSnippet: Bronwen,  We live in the country an hour outside of Atlanta and have just started to meet unschoolers.  Actually, in a few hours, we are hosting a
messages.messageBody:
Bronwen, We live in the country an hour outside of Atlanta and have just
started to meet unschoolers. Actually, in a few hours, we are hosting a
GAUnschoolers get together at our farm! I think about 6-7 families are
coming but am not sure. I will let you know how it goes and give you more
Atlanta info. and an invitation to the GAunschoolers list if you are
interested, when I have more time. COme on down (and over) ... We'd love
to meet you!

Madeline





At 04:35 PM 10/4/2003 -0700, you wrote:
>After a bunch of time messing around googleing, I thought I would ask you
>guys.
>
>I am interested in Atlanta GA.
>
>Unschooling? (found a few sites) it seems you have to test your kids, but
>keep the results? I am in CA now and I am a bit spoiled I think..
>
>Housing? is there a country (more inexpensive, with more land) type place
>close to Atlanta? (Mirrieta (sp). Is Atlanta the city a neat place to
>live? (we can go city or country really)
>
>You could reply off list if you want :-) or not :-)
>
>Love,
>Bronwen
>

messages.subject: Atlanta GA
messages.msgSnippet: After a bunch of time messing around googleing, I thought I would ask you guys. I am interested in Atlanta GA. Unschooling?  (found a few sites) it seems you
messages.messageBody:
After a bunch of time messing around googleing, I thought I would ask you
guys.

I am interested in Atlanta GA.

Unschooling? (found a few sites) it seems you have to test your kids, but
keep the results? I am in CA now and I am a bit spoiled I think..

Housing? is there a country (more inexpensive, with more land) type place
close to Atlanta? (Mirrieta (sp). Is Atlanta the city a neat place to
live? (we can go city or country really)

You could reply off list if you want :-) or not :-)

Love,
Bronwen
